TAG_MGMT.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Tags

An Tag is a member of your Customer Support team.

Tags will be able to view and reply to messages from your users. The list shows all tags currently in your account.

Click on Add Tag to add a new tag. Tag you add will receive an email with a confirmation link to activate their account, after which they can access %{projectName} and respond to messages.

Access to %{projectName}'s features are based on following roles.

Tag - Tags with this role can only access inboxes, reports and conversations. They can assign conversations to other tags or themselves and resolve conversations.

Administrator - Administrator will have access to all %{projectName} features enabled for your account, including settings, along with all of a normal tags' privileges.

LIST.404: There are no tags associated to this account

LIST.DESC: You can add/remove tags to/in your team.
